section2.title: What Can I Do For You?
section2.subtitle: With more than 20 years of experience managing support, infrastructure, networks and servers. And the last years immersed in the world of software development I have accumulated the knowledge in technologies and processes needed to support your technical processes. And after having formed 2 companies and having participated in business rounds for entrepreneurs I have enough experience in team management to make a positive impact on the business.
